* Rental Period: Villa rentals are available for day use from 11:00 AM to 5:00 PM. 
* Common Areas and Outdoor Spaces: Guests are welcome to enjoy the common areas and outdoor spaces during the specified rental hours. 
* Restricted Access: Bedrooms will not be accessible during the rental period. 
* Check-In and Check-Out: Please adhere to the designated check-in time of 11:00 AM and check-out time of 5:00 PM. 
* Reservation Confirmation: A confirmed reservation is required for villa rental. 
* Guest Responsibility: Guests are responsible for maintaining the cleanliness and good condition of the rented spaces. 
* Noise Levels: Please be mindful of noise levels to respect the privacy and tranquility of the surrounding areas. 
* Security Deposit: A security deposit may be required, refundable upon inspection and adherence to the rental guidelines. 
* Cancellation Policy: Refer to the cancellation policy for details on cancellations and refunds. 
* Code of Conduct: Guests are expected to conduct themselves in a respectful manner, adhering to all local laws and regulations. 
* Maximum Occupancy: The villa has a maximum occupancy limit; please ensure compliance. 
* Additional Services: Any additional services or requests should be communicated in advance and may be subject to additional charges. 
* Smoking and Pets: Smoking and pets are not allowed within the villa premises. 
* Liability: The villa owner or management is not liable for any loss, damage, or injury during the rental period. 
* Compliance: Guests are expected to comply with all rules and regulations outlined in the rental agreement. Enjoy your luxurious villa experience!
